summary.span: 初始化将用于查询或枚举的 类的一个新实例，从而允许用户指定不同选项的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to be used for queries or enumerations, allowing the user to specify values for the different options.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BlockSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置块操作的块大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size for block operations.

summary.span: 在对整个集合进行枚举时，WMI 将按指定大小的组返回结果。

span.span: When enumerating through a collection, WMI will return results in groups of the specified size.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值用于块操作中的块大小。

span.span: Returns an value used for the block size in block operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DirectRead { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为指定类请求直接访问 WMI 提供程序，而不考虑其超类或派生类。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class, without any regard to its super class or derived classes.

value.span: 返回值，该值指示是否*直接访问*到 WMI 提供程序请求指定的类。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether *direct access* to the WMI provider is requested for the specified class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果仅指定类的对象应接收，而不考虑派生或继承;否则为`false`。`true` if only objects of the specified class should be received, without regard to derivation or inheritance; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化变量替换构造函数，然后获取 WMI 类及其子类别的所有实例。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. [!code-csharp[wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead/cs/EnumerationOptions_DirectRead.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EnumerationOptions_DirectRead/vb/EnumerationOptions_DirectRead.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnsureLocatable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示返回的对象中是否应该有可定位信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to the objects returned should have locatable information in them.

summary.span: 这可确保系统属性（如“__PATH”、“__RELPATH”和“__SERVER”）非 null。

span.span: This ensures that the system properties, such as **__PATH**, **__RELPATH**, and **__SERVER**, are non-NULL.

summary.span: 此标志只能用在查询中，而在枚举中会被忽略。

span.span: This flag can only be used in queries, and is ignored in enumerations.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示返回的对象是否应包含可定位信息。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned should have locatable information in them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果 WMI 应确保所有返回的对象具有有效的路径;否则为`false`。`true` if WMI should ensure all returned objects have valid paths; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnumerateDeep { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将递归枚举请求到从指定的超类派生的所有类中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass.

summary.span: 如果为 ，则仅返回直接派生类成员。

span.span: If , only immediate derived class members are returned.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示是否将递归枚举请求到从指定的超类派生的所有类中。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果递归枚举请求到派生自指定的超类; 的所有类，否则为`false`。`true` if recursive enumeration is requested into all classes derived from the specified superclass; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化变量替换构造函数，然后获取 WMI 类及其子类别的所有实例。The following example initializes an variable with an constructor and then gets all the instances of a WMI class and its subclasses. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PrototypeOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示查询是否应返回结果集的原型而不返回实际结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results.

summary.span: 此标志用于获取原型。

span.span: This flag is used for prototyping.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示查询是否应返回结果集的原型而不返回实际的结果。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果查询返回的结果集而不是实际结果; 原型否则为`false`。`true` if the query should return a prototype of the result set instead of the actual results; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReturnImmediately { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示调用的操作应以同步方式或半同步方式执行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion.

summary.span: 如果此属性设置为 ，则会调用枚举，并且调用会立即返回。

span.span: If this property is set to , the enumeration is invoked and the call returns immediately.

summary.span: 遍历结果集合后，将出现实际的检索结果。

span.span: The actual retrieval of the results will occur when the resulting collection is walked.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示调用的操作应以同步方式执行还是以半同步方式执行。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果应以方式同步或半同步; 执行调用的操作否则为`false`。`true` if the invoked operation should be performed in a synchronous or semisynchronous fashion; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Rewindable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将集合假定为可重绕。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection is assumed to be rewindable.

summary.span: 如果为 ，则集合中的对象将保持以便用于多次枚举。

span.span: If , the objects in the collection will be kept available for multiple enumerations.

summary.span: 如果为 ，则只能将集合枚举一次。

span.span: If , the collection can only be enumerated one time.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示是否将集合假定为可回退。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the collection is assumed to be rewindable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果集合被假定为可倒回;否则为`false`。`true` if the collection is assumed to be rewindable; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAmendedQualifiers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从 WMI 返回的对象是否应包含已修正信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

summary.span: 通常，已修正信息就是附加在 WMI 对象上的可本地化信息，如对象和属性说明。

span.span: Typically, amended information is localizable information attached to the WMI object, such as object and property descriptions.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示从 WMI 返回的对象是否应包含已修正的信息。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果说明和其他修正的信息不感兴趣，请将此属性的值设置为`false`更高效。If descriptions and other amended information are not of interest, setting this property value to `false` is more efficient. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果从返回的对象 WMI 应包含修正的信息;否则为`false`。`true` if the objects returned from WMI should contain amended information; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
